sp_instance.title: How can we help?

sys_update_version.name: sp_instance_692999b797cd821007357d100153af4d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_instance"><sp_instance action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><class_name/><color>default</color><css>$background-primary: #FFFFFF !default;
$sp-panel-box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(23, 40, 52, 0.08) !default;
$border-primary: #8790A1 !default;
$border-secondary: #B3B7BC !default;
$border-tertiary: #DADDE2 !default;
$text-primary: #1D2223 !default;
$sp-space--xl: 24px !default;
$sp-space--xxl: 32px !default;
$sp-space--sm: 8px !default;
$sp-space--md: 12px !default;
$text-primary: #272822 !default;
$link-color: #3C59E7 !default;
$brand-primary-opacity: #E3E4F2 !default;

h2 {
  font-size: 32px;
  font-family: inherit;
  color: #fff;
  color: $text-white;
  text-align: left;
  margin-bottom: $sp-space--xl !important;
}

/* For suggestions in typeahead search when ais is enabled */
.aisearch {
	--now-color--primary-0: $brand-primary-opacity;
}

/* For suggestions in typeahead search when ais is disabled */
.typeahead-popup > .active > a, .typeahead-popup > .active > a:hover, .typeahead-popup > .active > a:focus {
	background-color: $brand-primary-opacity;
	color: #000;
}

.hidden-xs {
  display: block !important;
}

form {
  height: 46px;
  border-radius: $sp-space--sm;
}

#homepage-search {
  margin: 72px 0px 74px 0px !important;
  padding-top: 0px !important;
  padding-bottom: 0px !important;
  div {
    padding: 0px !important;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  #homepage-search{
    margin-top: 35px !important;
    margin-bottom: 116px !important;
    padding-left: $sp-space--xxl !important;
    padding-right: $sp-space--xxl !important;
  }
  h2 {
    margin-bottom: 17px !important;
  }
}

button {
  height: 44px;
  color: #717171;
  box-shadow: none;
  border-bottom-right-radius: $sp-space--sm;
  border-top-right-radius: $sp-space--sm;
}

input {
  box-shadow: none;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-family: inherit;
  color: $text-tertiary;
  padding: $sp-space--md;
  height: 44px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: $sp-space--sm;
  border-top-left-radius: $sp-space--sm;
}

button:focus, input:focus {
border: 2px solid $link-color;
}</css><glyph/><id/><order>1</order><roles/><short_description/><size>md</size><sp_column display_value="1">ed2999b797cd821007357d100153af4a</sp_column><sp_widget display_value="Homepage Search">200fbd96cb20020000f8d856634c9ca1</sp_widget><sys_class_name>sp_instance</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-26 19:37:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>692999b797cd821007357d100153af4d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>How can we help?</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_1022286_hr">3acfee4497f4021007357d100153afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">3acfee4497f4021007357d100153afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_instance_692999b797cd821007357d100153af4d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-26 19:37:11</sys_updated_on><title>How can we help?</title><url/><widget_parameters><![CDATA[{
	"typeahead_search": {
		"value": "{title: 'Search'}",
		"displayValue": "{title: 'Search'}"
	}
}]]></widget_parameters></sp_instance><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=692999b797cd821007357d100153af4d"/></record_update>
